item.description:
Reminder from: BostonSwingDance Yahoo! Group

Title: Swing Dance with The Fried Bananas

Date: Saturday February 7, 2009
Time: 8:00 pm - 12:00 am
Location: St. James Armenian Church
Street: 465 Mt. Auburn St
City State Zip: Watertown, MA 02472
Phone: 617-924-6603
Notes: The Fried Bananas was created with the goal of providing music for swing dancers and plays a mix of blues, swing, and gypsy jazz. Now one of the most popular local bands, why not come out and see what all of the fuss is about!

Beginners are Welcome:
Swing dance lesson from 8-9 with Nicole Zuckerman and Amanda Gruhl.
The band plays from 9-12.

Admission: $15 or $10 for students

To view our entire schedule, read dance-related articles, or download our calendar visit our website at:
http://www.bostonswin...
Please forward this email to anyone who may be interested.

Would you like to dance for free? Work at the front desk for 1 hour and get in to that night's dance. You must sign up in advance, either at the front desk, or by emailing Roger at bostonswingdance.com.

Get reminders on your mobile, Yahoo! Messenger, and email.
Edit reminder options
